segments.text: It's weekend again , I'm glad I can arrange for my personal matters .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What do you mean by that ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , that means I can do whatever I like without few interruptions .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You've been always active and versatile . It seems that you are interested in everything .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , really ? I just have lots of hobbies in my spare time ; such as going to the concert , painting , handwriting , reading novels and reading fashion magazines . What about yours ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I have fewer hobbies than yours . That's why I find campus life a bit dull and uninteresting .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , you can't think like that . We young people should try our best to learn new things and accept new ideas . You like taking photos and going to photography shows , why not practise the technique and catch something unforgeable ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That's a good suggestion . It's fine today . Maybe I can take photos on the scenery of the lake at sunset . It must be fantastic .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I quite agree with you . With our hobbies , our life can be more colorful and exciting .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: And I can concentrate on my study after the relaxation over the weekend .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , it's a good habit to have a life-long hobby . Those who practise calligraphy and Qigong always live longer .
segments.speaker: S1
